question_text:
Question 31  
 
 
 
 
 
 
Digital Electronics : ADC and DAC

GATE 2023 
 [Afternoon Session]
Electronics & Communication Engineering
PAGE
20

The signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) of an ADC with a full-scale sinusoidal input is given to be 61.96 dB. The 
resolution of the ADC is _______ bits. (rounded off to nearest integer) 
Ans. 10 (10 to 10)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Given : 
 
SNR of ADC 
61.96dB

SNR 
1.76
6.02 dB
n


 
 
61.96
1.76
6.02
n


 
 
10
n
 
Hence, the correct answer is 10.
